alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 02 at 9:59AM EDT until further notice by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Florida... Alafia River At Lithia affecting Hillsborough County. Peace River At Arcadia at SR 70 affecting DeSoto County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Horse Creek Near Arcadia at SR 72 affecting DeSoto County. .Rivers will continue to rise in response to heavy rainfall from Idalia. For the Alafia...including Lithia ...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Peace...including Zolfo Springs at SR 17, Arcadia at SR 70... Minor flooding is forecast. For the Horse Creek...including Arcadia at SR 72...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Peace River at Arcadia at SR 70. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Peace River Campground floods and 6 homes at River Acres are impacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 10.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 13.8 feet early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.8 feet on 10/03/1979. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Peace River Arcadia at SR 7 11.0 10.3 Sat 9 am 10.7 12.1 13.4 13.7 13.3 &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 100 AM EDT.
